<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:date="http://exslt.org/dates-and-times" version="1.0"> <!--===== AUTHOR ===== (c) Copyright 2017 MrWatson, russell@mrwatson.de All Rights Reserved. ===== PURPOSE ===== XSL-File: XMTB_XMSC_CreateUpdateScript.xsl XML-Source: fmxmlsnippet.xml XML-Grammar: fmxmlsnippet XML-Content: copied table definitions Generates the script steps for an Update Script. ===== CHANGES HISTORY ===== (c) russell@mrwatson.de 2011-2016 2011-01-21 MrW: Version 1.0 --> <!-- ===== HEAD ===== --> <xsl:output method="xml" version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" indent="yes" omit-xml-declaration="no" cdata-section-elements="Calculation Text Data"/> <xsl:include href="../../../fmCheckMate/xsl/_inc/constants.xsl"/> <xsl:include href="../../../fmCheckMate/xsl/_inc/fn.CommonFunctions.xsl "/> <!--===== PARAMETER =====--> <xsl:param name="pFileName" select="'myDB'"/> <xsl:param name="pMitarbeiterKuerzel"><xsl:text>Line 1 Line2</xsl:text></xsl:param> <!--===== VARIABLES =====--> <xsl:variable name="delimiter" select="$TAB"/> <xsl:variable name="newrecord" select="$RETURN"/> <!-- --> <xsl:variable name="FileName" select="$pFileName"/> <xsl:variable name="ModuleName" select="$FileName"/> <!-- --> <xsl:variable name="now" select="date:date-time()"/> <xsl:variable name="DD.MM.YY" select="concat(substring($now,9,2),'.',substring($now,6,2),'.',substring($now,3,2))"/> <xsl:variable name="YYYY-MM-DD" select="concat(substring($now,1,4),'-',substring($now,6,2),'-',substring($now,9,2))"/> <xsl:variable name="formattedDate" select="$YYYY-MM-DD"/> <xsl:variable name="MitarbeiterKuerzel" select="$pMitarbeiterKuerzel"/> <!--===== TEMPLATES =====--> <!-- Fields with serials --> <xsl:template match="/"> <fmxmlsnippet type="FMObjectList"> <!-- Update Script --> <Script includeInMenu="False" runFullAccess="True" id="0" name="Update"> <Step enable="True" id="89" name="Comment"/> <Step enable="True" id="89" name="Comment"> <Text> <xsl:value-of select="concat($formattedDate,' ', $MitarbeiterKuerzel, ' Script generiert')"/> </Text> </Step> <Step enable="True" id="89" name="Comment"/> <Step enable="True" id="85" name="Allow User Abort"> <Set state="False"/> </Step> <Step enable="True" id="86" name="Set Error Capture"> <Set state="True"/> </Step> <Step enable="True" id="89" name="Comment"/> <!-- Loop for each Table --> <xsl:for-each select="//BaseTable"> <xsl:variable name="BaseTableName" select="@name"/> <xsl:variable name="BaseTableID" select="'0'"/> <xsl:variable name="ServiceLayoutName" select="concat('I Service ',$BaseTableName)"/> <!-- --> <Step enable="True" id="89" name="Comment"> <Text>-----------------------------------------</Text> </Step> <Step enable="True" id="89" name="Comment"> <Text> <xsl:value-of select="concat('Tabelle ',$BaseTableName)"/> </Text> </Step> <Step enable="True" id="6" name="Go to Layout"> <LayoutDestination value="SelectedLayout"/> <Layout id="0" name="{$ServiceLayoutName}"/> </Step> <Step enable="True" id="89" name="Comment"/> <Step enable="True" id="35" name="Import Records"> <NoInteract state="True"/> <NotWinStep state="False"/> <Restore state="True"/> <DataSourceType value="File"/> <Profile table="1065089" FirstRowIsData="False" DataType="FMPR"/> <UniversalPathList> <xsl:value-of select="concat('file:../Sicherung/',$FileName)"/> </UniversalPathList> <ImportOptions CharacterSet="Windows" AutoEnter="False" SplitRepetitions="False" method="Add"/> <Table id="{$BaseTableID}" name="{$BaseTableName}"/> <TargetFields> <!-- will be automatically generated --> </TargetFields> </Step> <Step enable="True" id="141" name="Set Variable"> <Value> <Calculation><![CDATA[Hole (ScriptResult)]]></Calculation> </Value> <Repetition> <Calculation><![CDATA[1]]></Calculation> </Repetition> <Name>$error</Name> </Step> <Step enable="True" id="89" name="Comment"/> <Step enable="True" id="1" name="Perform Script"> <CurrentScript value="Pause"/> <Calculation><![CDATA[$error]]></Calculation> <Script id="122" name="LOG Schreiben (text Aktion)"/> </Step> <!-- ! For each ID-field create Script to correctly reset the serialnumber ! --> <xsl:variable name="NumberOfSerials" select="count(Field[AutoEnter/Serial])"/> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="$NumberOfSerials=0"> <Step enable="True" id="89" name="Comment"/> <Step enable="True" id="89" name="Comment"> <Text> - Keine Felder mit Seriennummer vorhanden</Text> </Step> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <Step enable="True" id="89" name="Comment"/> <Step enable="True" id="23" name="Show All Records"/> <xsl:for-each select="Field[AutoEnter/Serial]"> <xsl:sort select="@name"/> <xsl:variable name="FieldName" select="@name"/> <xsl:variable name="FieldID" select="@id"/> <!-- --> <Step enable="True" id="89" name="Comment"> <Text> <xsl:value-of select="concat('Fortlaufende Nummer setzen: ',@name)"/> </Text> </Step> <Step enable="True" id="39" name="Sort Records"> <NoInteract state="True"/> <Restore state="True"/> <SortList value="True"> <Sort type="Ascending"> <PrimaryField> <Field table="{$BaseTableName}" id="{$FieldID}" name="{$FieldName}"/> </PrimaryField> </Sort> </SortList> </Step> <Step enable="True" id="16" name="Go to Record/Request/Page"> <NoInteract state="False"/> <RowPageLocation value="Last"/> </Step> <Step enable="True" id="116" name="Set Next Serial Value"> <Calculation> <xsl:value-of select="concat($BaseTableName,'::',$FieldName,' + 1')"/> </Calculation> <Field table="{$BaseTableName}" id="{$FieldID}" name="{$FieldName}"/> </Step> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> <Step enable="True" id="89" name="Comment"/> </xsl:for-each> <Step enable="True" id="89" name="Comment"> <Text>-----------------------------------------</Text> </Step> <Step enable="True" id="89" name="Comment"> <Text>fertig</Text> </Step> <Step enable="True" id="21" name="Unsort Records"/> <Step enable="True" id="6" name="Go to Layout"> <LayoutDestination value="OriginalLayout"/> </Step> <Step enable="True" id="89" name="Comment"/> </Script> </fmxmlsnippet> </xsl:template> <!-- ignore all other text --> <xsl:template match="text()"/> </xsl:stylesheet>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:date="http://exslt.org/dates-and-times" version="1.0"> <!--===== AUTHOR ===== (c) state="False"/> </Step> <Step enable="True" id="86" name="Set Error Capture"> <Set state="True"/> </Step> <Step enable="True" id="89" name="Comment"/> <!-- Loop for each Table --> <xsl:for-each select="//BaseTable"> <xsl:variable name="BaseTableName" select="@name"/> <xsl:variable name="BaseTableID" select="'0'"/> <xsl:variable name="ServiceLayoutName" select="concat('I Service ',$BaseTableName)"/> <!-- --> <Step enable="True" id="89" name="Comment"> <Text>-----------------------------------------</Text> </Step> <Step enable="True" id="89" name="Comment"> <Text> <xsl:value-of select="concat('Tabelle ',$BaseTableName)"/> </Text> </Step> <Step enable="True" id="6" name="Go to Layout"> <LayoutDestination value="SelectedLayout"/> <Layout id="0" name="{$ServiceLayoutName}"/> </Step> <Step enable="True" id="89" name="Comment"/> <Step enable="True" id="35" name="Import Records"> <NoInteract state="True"/> <NotWinStep state="False"/> <Restore state="True"/> <DataSourceType value="File"/> <Profile table="1065089" FirstRowIsData="False" DataType="FMPR"/> <UniversalPathList> <xsl:value-of select="concat('file:../Sicherung/',$FileName)"/> </UniversalPathList> <ImportOptions CharacterSet="Windows" AutoEnter="False" SplitRepetitions="False" method="Add"/> <Table id="{$BaseTableID}" name="{$BaseTableName}"/> <TargetFields> <!-- will be For each ID-field create Script to correctly reset the serialnumber ! --> <xsl:variable name="NumberOfSerials" select="count(Field[AutoEnter/Serial])"/> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="$NumberOfSerials=0"> <Step enable="True" id="89" name="Comment"/> <Step enable="True" id="89" name="Comment"> <Text> - Keine Felder mit Seriennummer vorhanden</Text> </Step> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <Step enable="True" id="89" name="Comment"/> <Step enable="True" id="23" name="Show All Records"/> <xsl:for-each select="Field[AutoEnter/Serial]"> <xsl:sort select="@name"/> <xsl:variable name="FieldName" select="@name"/> <xsl:variable name="FieldID" select="@id"/> <!-- --> <Step enable="True" id="89" name="Comment"> <Text> <xsl:value-of select="concat('Fortlaufende Nummer setzen: ',@name)"/> </Text> </Step> <Step enable="True" id="39" name="Sort Records"> <NoInteract state="True"/> <Restore state="True"/> <SortList value="True"> <Sort type="Ascending"> <PrimaryField> <Field table="{$BaseTableName}" id="{$FieldID}" name="{$FieldName}"/> </PrimaryField> </Sort> </SortList> </Step> <Step enable="True" id="16" name="Go to Record/Request/Page"> <NoInteract state="False"/> <RowPageLocation value="Last"/> </Step> <Step enable="True" id="116" name="Set Next Serial Value"> <Calculation> <xsl:value-of select="concat($BaseTableName,'::',$FieldName,' + 1')"/> </Calculation> <Field table="{$BaseTableName}" id="{$FieldID}" name="{$FieldName}"/> </Step> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> <Step enable="True" id="89" name="Comment"/> </xsl:for-each> <Step enable="True" id="89" name="Comment"> <Text>-----------------------------------------</Text> </Step> <Step enable="True" id="89" name="Comment"> <Text>fertig</Text> </Step> <Step enable="True" id="21" name="Unsort Records"/> <Step enable="True" id="6" name="Go to Layout"> <LayoutDestination value="OriginalLayout"/> </Step> <Step enable="True" id="89" name="Comment"/> </Script> </fmxmlsnippet> </xsl:template> <!-- ignore all other text --> <xsl:template match="text()"/> </xsl:stylesheet>

Funktionen (alphabetische Liste) Datensätze als Snapshot-Link speichern Funktionen (Kategorienliste) Aus zuletzt geöffnetem Satz einfügen Auf FileMaker Server hochladen Schreibe Änderung Datens./Abfrage Alle Datens./Abfragen kopieren Nächste fortlaufende Nummer setzen Gehe zu Datens./Abfrage/Seite Verwerfe Änderung Datens./Abfrage Datensatz/Abfrage duplizieren Anwenderwörterbuch bearbeiten...
